references: R. C. Mullin and P. J. Schellenberg, The enumeration of c-nets via triangulations, J. Combin. Theory, 4 (1968), 259-276.

N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: a(n) = T(n+1,n) where T(n,m) is defined in A210252. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Sep 29 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
